attributes.action: Stan Collymore should be sacked for his comments about the Falklands
attributes.additional_details:
The Depart for Culture, Medial and Sport should call for Stan Collymore to be sacked from Talk Sport Radio after his comments

 'Falklands? We just thieved it':
 'f***ing island with sheep'

255 british service men lost there live in this conflict and many more where injured,

please support this petition in memory of them!
